text: Frog Went A-Courtin' is a book by John Langstaff and illustrated by Feodor Rojankovsky. Released by Harcourt, it was the recipient of the Caldecott Medal for illustration in 1956.American Library Association: Caldecott Medal Winners, 1938 - Present. URL accessed 27 May 2009. It is based on the folk song "Frog Went A-Courting." ==References== Category:1955 children's books Category:Caldecott Medal-winning works Category:American picture books Category:Harcourt (publisher) books Category:Fictional frogs and toads
title: Frog Went A-Courtin' (book)
